name: Eight Nights Eight Games (Demo)
description:
Warning:

the game says "you can turn off flashing lights", this is false! 

If you are sensitive to flashing lights do NOT play this game until the patch comes out.

After events of the first game a new time has come for horrors and sorrow. A trusty friend walks you do his house to have a normal chat, but after drinking a glass of water he gave you pass out and wake up in an unknown area. You're confused and terrified, but your friend comes on the intercom and instructs you on how to play his game.
